Tweets: Don’t take your sins lightly. You may think you’ve done nothing wrong but you forgot how you shouted at the housekeeper when you lost your temper;  the person you pushed aside so you got ahead of the queue. May the Almighty help us to constantly reflect on our shortcomings.

Tweets: Being happy & being content are two different things. Happiness is fleeting, it comes & goes, comes mainly from the outside. Contentment comes from a deeper place. You’re at peace with what the Almighty has bestowed on you, no matter what your circumstances. You trust Him fully

Tweets: You cannot control other people. Period. You can’t force them to do what they don’t want to do. The only person you can control is you.  So don’t let their behaviour & what they do upset you. Your worrying, obsessing, venting etc, has zero impact on them. It only hurts you.
